articles.title: Number of orgs compromised via Ivanti VPN zero-days grows as Mandiant weighs in - The Register
articles.description: Snoops had no fewer than five custom bits of malware to hand to backdoor networks
articles.content:
Two zero-day bugs in Ivanti products were likely under attack by cyberspies as early as December, according to Mandiant's threat intel team.

articles.content:
